title: Appleseed Saga Ex Machina (Dub)
alternative_title: Appleseed: Ex Machina, Appleseed 2, Appleseed 2007, エクスマキナ
description: Deunan, a young female warrior, and Briareos, a veteran cyborg-soldier, are both partners and lovers. As members of E.S.W.A.T., the elite special forces serving Olympus, they are deployed whenever trouble strikes. The two fighters find their partnership tested in a new way by the arrival of a new member to their ranks—an experimental Bioroid named Tereus.
